name: 0h Game Jam 2
description:
Made for 0h Game Jam 2 in October 2012. Zero Hour Game Jam is happening from 2 a.m. to 2 a.m. every DST time shift.

  • Move: ← ↑ ↓ → or WASD
  • Shoot: <Space>

I used some pre-made base code and assets from other projects I was working on at that time, so it's not completely a 0h game.
